channel.title: Cloud Computing on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Computing on FinanClub

item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:1129 Chances: Oracle leads stocks to watch with AI and cloud play, along with Amazon rival MercadoLibre. Oracle announces new Oracle Cloud for Australian Government and Defense to meet growing global demand. Wendy’s implements Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications Suite and moves to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for improved business insights.

item.title: HPE
item.description: score:1112 Chances: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) announces a transition plan for CFO Tarek Robbiati, who will assume an external CEO role. HPE expands its Bare Metal Cloud platform with cloud-native HPE ProLiant RL300 Gen11 servers, enhancing AI inferencing and cloud-native workloads. ZoomInfo delivered positive earnings and revenue surprises for Q2 2023, potentially impacting HPE’s stock and market sentiment.

item.title: BABA
item.description: score:1083 Chances: Alibaba Cloud releases open-source large language models (LLMs) to expand its influence in generative artificial intelligence. Paytm founder Vijay Shekhar Sharma to acquire a 10.3% stake in Ant Group from Alibaba, becoming the company’s largest shareholder. Alibaba introduces licensing requirement for businesses with over 100 million monthly active users to access its large language models (LLMs).
